price: Each nation has its appointed time. When their appointed time comes, they cannot delay it for a moment or bring it forward.
arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
